description: Try our easy to follow Banana & Nut Crepes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet crepe,Banana,High fibre,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Banana & Nut Crepes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare crepes according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, heat butter in a non-stick frying pan until bubbling. Add bananas, sultanas and nuts and stir over medium heat for 1 minute until warm.
Lay a crepe onto each serving plate and top with banana mixture. Roll up or fold into a triangle and serve with hot fudge sauce and ice cream or whipped cream.
